Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Michigan/14th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive and 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 16th, Indiana, Roosevelt and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both Michigan, 16th, Indiana, Roosevelt and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Michigan/14th
ShortDescription: WB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Indiana, 16th, Wabash and Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Michigan/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Indiana, 16th, Wabash and Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Michigan/14th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
